default.shortDescription: contexxt.ai's mission is to empower employees to successfully use IT applications such as Microsoft Teams in a data-driven and individualized way, rather than a one fits all approach.
default.featuredTitle: We digitize companies: the people, not technology.
featuredParagraphs: Our experienced consultants accompany you on your digitization journey. Oriented to the needs of your employees, we support you in aligning your digitization project with your corporate values and guidelines - in "New Work" or software implementations as well as in cultural development processes or innovation cycles.

For us, the focus is on people and their needs in their work environment. On the way to the digital workplace, our data platform C.AI Adoption Analytics succeeds in picking up people where they currently stand in their personal digital development. Based on the insights gained you are able to derive the appropriate measures to facilitate employees' individual access to new digital tools and ways of working.

In this process, our chatbot C.AI helps Teams users individually and automatically to build and expand their tool competencies in Microsoft Teams. Based on behavioral patterns, digital maturity and personal learning speeds, C.AI adapts to the user's needs.

callToAction.title: We turn everyone into a Teams rockstar – with C.AI Adoption Bot
callToAction.description: Our C.AI Adoption Bot empowers employees based on their individual Microsoft Teams experience and learning preferences. Try it out and download the bot from the Microsoft Teams Store.
